text:
Service Partner ONE - Berlin - Onsite http://servicepartner.one/

We're building a digital solution for office management, digitalizing a market that hasn't moved much in the past 40 years.

Technologies used: Angular.js, Node.js, Express.js, Heroku, PostgreSQL, AWS, Salesforce, lots of quirky CSS3. Looking at React, React-Native, LoopBack.js

Hiring frontend developers/ designers, Salesforce gurus and any technology ninjas. Get in touch at it@servicepartner.one
